caption.p: High-level temporal and spatial allelic variation in the meningococcal PilE protein deduced from pilE genes. An alignment of the amino acid sequences of the PilE protein for 24 isolates from carrier V222 are shown. Sequences were derived by Sanger sequencing of PCR products spanning the pilE gene. Isolates were derived from four different time points representing up to 6 months of carriage, with 6 isolates per time point ( Fig. 1).
